name: Cold Email Automation - Data Science Outreach

parameters.subject: ={{ 'MNIT Graduate | Data Scientist interested in ' + $json.companyName }}
parameters.text:
={{ 'Hi ' + $json.hrName + ',

I'm actively looking for Data Science roles and interested in ' + $json.companyName + '.

Currently at RGA (Reinsurance Group of America), where I:
• Built fraud detection models that reduced fraudulent policies by 11%
• Increased underwriting efficiency from 50% to 60% using ML on 200K+ records
• Developed predictive models improving risk classification accuracy by 8%

BTech from NIT Jaipur with strong Python/ML expertise. I'd love to interview for data science positions at ' + $json.companyName + '.

Are you hiring, or could you point me to who handles data science recruitment?

Resume attached. Happy to discuss further.

Best Regards,
Sejal Gupta
+91 8890176883
linkedin.com/in/sejal-gupta-2a542b258' }}
